name: Princess Siwa Color Book
description:
Coloring a Art doll gives you the opportunity to choose a variety of dolls for coloring. Princess Color Book has an interesting and colorful doll design.
So it's time to paint the princess and the beautiful doll of the royal doll house.
Coloring is the best exercise for the mind. We provide healthy apps that help your brain muscles relax. We guarantee you by playing this thing.
You will forget your worries. It is the most versatile and expert coloring game that gives you happiness and happiness. Princess Color Book helps you to feel relaxed while in depression, especially for Alzheimer's patients. The game has various shades and creative designs of dolls.
Doll Art Coloring Book Features:
- Excellent HD graphics
- Various coloring pages of your favorite dolls.
- The palette consists of many attractive shades.
- Add color to the shape with a paint bucket.
- Double-tapping will delete your color. Now try using a new color.
- Maximum zoom ratio
- Save your image and use it as a background image.
- You have your own gallery where you can collect all your artwork.
- Share your creativity with your friends and family.
